name: VotingBinaryImageFilter
public_declarations: Self &SetRadius( unsigned int r ) { this->m_Radius = std::vector<unsigned int>(3, r ); return *this; }

members.name: Radius
members.detaileddescriptionSet: Set the radius of the neighborhood used to compute the median.
members.detaileddescriptionGet: Get the radius of the neighborhood used to compute the median

members.name: BirthThreshold
members.detaileddescriptionSet: Birth threshold. Pixels that are OFF will turn ON when the number of neighbors ON is larger than the value defined in this threshold.
members.detaileddescriptionGet: Birth threshold. Pixels that are OFF will turn ON when the number of neighbors ON is larger than the value defined in this threshold.

members.name: SurvivalThreshold
members.detaileddescriptionSet: Survival threshold. Pixels that are ON will turn OFF when the number of neighbors ON is smaller than the value defined in this survival threshold.
members.detaileddescriptionGet: Survival threshold. Pixels that are ON will turn OFF when the number of neighbors ON is smaller than the value defined in this survival threshold.

members.name: ForegroundValue
members.detaileddescriptionSet: Set the value associated with the Foreground (or the object) on the binary input image and the Background .
members.detaileddescriptionGet: Get the value associated with the Foreground (or the object) on the binary input image and the Background .

members.name: BackgroundValue
members.detaileddescriptionSet: Set the value associated with the Foreground (or the object) on the binary input image and the Background .
members.detaileddescriptionGet: Get the value associated with the Foreground (or the object) on the binary input image and the Background .

briefdescription: Applies a voting operation in a neighborhood of each pixel.
detaileddescription:
\note Pixels which are not Foreground or Background will remain unchanged.
